/config.description: Choose a Share for Plex Requests configuration. Eg: create a Share called plexrequests-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run Plex with. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID

Plex Request.more_info:
Allow Plex Users to request new content.

Plexrequests, a simple automated way for users to request new content for Plex Users can search for content to request. Integrates with couchpotato, sonarr and sickrage etc...
